channel.title: web on Datafortress.cloud
channel.description: Recent content in web on Datafortress.cloud

item.title: Tech NEWS 2022-02-15
item.description: Pixel will be able to stream Android apps to your Chromebook or PC (4 minute read) The first Android 13 Developer Preview built for Pixel phones includes two Cross Device service apps dedicated to connecting Pixels to other devices.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-11-04
item.description: Facebook skirts Apple’s App Store fees with custom subscription links for creators (3 minute read) Facebook creators will soon be able to share custom web links to direct their fans to pay for subscriptions using Facebook’s native payments system.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-10-27
item.description: Uber jumps into Europe’s rapid grocery delivery market with 15-minute service in Paris (3 minute read) Uber and Carrefour have created a service in Paris that ships essential items to customers in as little as 15 minutes.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-09-02
item.description: Google developing own CPUs for Chromebook laptops (4 minute read) Google is developing its own central processors for its notebook and tablet computers and plans to roll them out around 2023.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-07-26
item.description: Google parent Alphabet launches Intrinsic: a new company to build software for industrial robots (3 minute read) Intrinsic is a new company from Alphabet that focuses on building software for industrial robots.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-07-14
item.description: Apple developing new ‘Apple Pay Later’ service to let customers buy any Apple Pay purchases in monthly installments (2 minute read) Apple is working on a new service called Apple Pay Later that will allow users to buy products and pay them off in monthly installments.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-05-12
item.description: TikTok is reportedly testing a job recruitment tools (1 minute read) TikTok is testing a recruitment tool to help people find jobs and to help companies, recruiters, and brands find candidates.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-02-16
item.description: Another New Tesla Semi Prototype Spotted in California (2 minute read) A new Tesla Semi truck prototype has been spotted in Truckee, CA.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-12-28
item.description: Tesla’s new Boombox feature will let car owners fart at unsuspecting neighbors (2 minute read) Tesla has rolled out its 2020.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-11-04
item.description: Ant Group’s record $34.5 billion IPO in Shanghai and Hong Kong is suspended (3 minute read) Ant Group’s world record-setting initial public offering has been suspended.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-10-20
item.description: ‘Apple Music TV’ Launches in U.S. (1 minute read) Apple has just launched Apple Music TV, a 24-hour stream of music videos, live shows, and events.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-09-03
item.description: Google proposes new campus billed as a ‘neighborhood’ with homes and shops (1 minute read) Google has unveiled plans to build a new corporate campus in Mountain View, California.
